name: brilliant white
description:
This is 'brilliant white', a new video game from Outhouse Media. The action game, which has been rumoured to have been in development since 2013 and is due to hit shelves in November 2017, features an all-black cast of characters.
The game, which is set in 2025, is set in an alternate reality where the player has mastered the language of computer games at the age of 12 years old. In this era, players are competing to be the top 100,000 computer gamers for a chance to stay alive and progress in their careers by gaining new clients. It's truly gripping, if that is the word we're used to hearing from a game this enthusiastic. Those visuals, while not quite as good as the one that made us fall in love with yesterday's gossamer-like 1080p G-Sync presentation, at least don't look like the chunky, 1,280p, 30fps Microsoft Windows 10 laptop. As anyone who's played Grand Theft Auto V will realise, which is why we're revealing this 'brilliant' game, the game is nearing completion! Featuring very coloured characters, the game's colours combine with the existing art to create a very beautiful aesthetic. So, it's a very good thing for Naughty Dog too, because seriously though… The game is inspired by the hit game Uncharted. This game is very much on the level of the Uncharted games, but with a twist.
